whatIs.question: What is Apex?
whatIs.answer: Apex is a comprehensive utility-first CSS framework with 500+ utility classes designed for rapid UI development. It provides a set of low-level utility classes that let you build completely custom designs without leaving your HTML.

productionReady.question: Is Apex production-ready?
productionReady.answer: Yes! Apex is stable and production-ready. It is used by many projects in production environments.

newSyntax.question: Do I need to learn a new syntax?
newSyntax.answer: No, Apex uses standard CSS class names. If you are familiar with utility-first CSS, you will feel right at home.

customize.question: Can I customize the framework?
customize.answer: Absolutely! Apex is highly customizable through CSS variables and configuration options. You can change colors, spacing scales, and more.

darkMode.question: Does Apex support dark mode?
darkMode.answer: Yes, Apex has built-in dark mode support with the dark: variant prefix, making it easy to style your components for both light and dark themes.

rtl.question: Is there RTL support?
rtl.answer: Yes, Apex includes full RTL (Right-to-Left) support for internationalization.

fileSize.title: File Size
fileSize.content: The full Apex build is approximately 15KB minified and gzipped. With purging enabled, your CSS bundle will only include the utilities you actually use.

purgecss.content: Apex uses PurgeCSS to remove unused styles. Configure your purge options in the configuration file.

rtl.title: RTL Support
rtl.description: Apex includes built-in RTL (Right-to-Left) support for internationalization. Perfect for Arabic, Hebrew, and other RTL languages.

howItWorks.title: How It Works
howItWorks.content: Apex uses logical properties that automatically adapt to the document direction. When you set dir="rtl" on your HTML element, all utilities with directional properties will flip automatically.

layout.title: RTL Layout
layout.description: See how layout utilities automatically flip in RTL mode.

spacing.title: RTL Spacing
spacing.description: Margin and padding utilities automatically adapt to text direction.

flexbox.title: RTL Flexbox
flexbox.description: Flexbox layouts maintain their visual structure in RTL mode.

textAlignment.title: RTL Text Alignment
textAlignment.description: Text alignment utilities work with logical properties.

reactNextjs.title: 2. React/Next.js with next-intl
reactNextjs.automaticallyHandles: Automatically handles RTL for Arabic and Hebrew
reactNextjs.dirAttributeSet: The dir attribute is set based on locale

importantConsiderations.title: Important Considerations
importantConsiderations.useLogical: Use logical properties (start/end) when possible for better RTL support
importantConsiderations.iconsImages: Icons and images may need manual adjustment in RTL layouts
importantConsiderations.testWithActual: Test with actual RTL content, not just flipped LTR text
importantConsiderations.considerBidirectional: Consider bidirectional text with mixed content

basicTable.description: A simple table with basic styling.

stripedTable.description: Add zebra striping to table rows for better readability.

hoverableTable.description: Add hover effect to table rows for better interactivity.

borderedTable.description: Add borders to all cells for a more defined table structure.

compactTable.description: A more compact table with reduced padding.

tableWithActions.description: Add action buttons to table rows for interactive functionality.

basicTabs.description: A simple tab component with basic styling.

pillTabs.title: Pill Tabs
pillTabs.description: Tabs with pill-shaped styling for a more modern look.

underlineTabs.description: Minimal tabs with underline indicator for the active tab.

disabledTab.description: Disable tabs that are not available for interaction.

confirmationModal.description: A modal for confirming destructive or important actions.

dropdownPositions.description: Position the dropdown menu in different directions.

dropdownSizes.title: Dropdown Sizes
dropdownSizes.description: Dropdowns are available in different sizes.

accordionWithIcons.title: Accordion with Icons

accordionWithDescription.description: Add a description below the accordion title.

compactAccordion.title: Compact Accordion
compactAccordion.description: A more compact accordion with reduced padding.

fontSizes.description: Control the font size of an element using the text-size utilities.

textColors.description: Control the text color of an element.

maxWidth.description: Control the maximum width of an element.

maxHeight.description: Control the maximum height of an element.

aspectRatio.title: Aspect Ratio
aspectRatio.description: Control the aspect ratio of an element.

borderWidth.title: Border Width
borderWidth.description: Add borders to elements with different widths.

borderSides.title: Border Sides
borderSides.description: Add borders to specific sides of an element.

troubleshooting.title: Troubleshooting
troubleshooting.description: Common issues and how to resolve them.

needMoreHelp.title: Need more help?
needMoreHelp.content: If you cannot find a solution here, please check the FAQ or join our community Discord.

stylesNotApplying.title: Styles not applying
stylesNotApplying.solution: Make sure you have imported the Apex CSS file in your project. Check that the path to the CSS file is correct.

darkModeNotWorking.title: Dark mode not working
darkModeNotWorking.solution: Ensure you have the dark class on your HTML element or that your system preference is set to dark mode.

customColorsNotAppearing.title: Custom colors not appearing
customColorsNotAppearing.solution: Check your configuration file and make sure you have rebuilt the CSS after making changes.

rtlLayoutIssues.title: RTL layout issues
rtlLayoutIssues.solution: Verify that you have set dir="rtl" on your HTML element and are using RTL-aware utilities like ms- and me- instead of ml- and mr-.

buildErrors.title: Build errors
buildErrors.solution: Make sure you have the latest version of Apex installed. Try deleting node_modules and running npm install again.

feedback.title: Was this helpful?
feedback.placeholder: Tell us more about your experience...

playground.title: Playground
playground.description: Try Apex utilities directly in your browser. Edit the HTML and see the result instantly.
playground.tabIndent: Press Tab to indent and Shift+Tab to outdent

rtl.title: RTL Support
rtl.description: Apex includes built-in RTL (Right-to-Left) support for internationalization.

home.title: Apex
home.description: A comprehensive utility-first CSS framework with 500+ utility classes for rapid UI development.

welcomeAlert.title: Welcome!
welcomeAlert.content: Welcome to the Apex documentation. This utility-first framework provides a comprehensive set of CSS classes for rapid UI development, including spacing, typography, colors, flexbox, grid, animations, transforms, filters, and much more.
